alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Saline (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:54AM CDT until May 07 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Saline County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Gallatin County in southern Illinois... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 854 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galatia, or near Eldorado, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Eldorado, Galatia, Ridgway, Equality, Raleigh, Omaha, Junction and Muddy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
